      protected static int getMultiTaskThreadPoolSize() 
      static int getNumberOfActiveThreads(ParaTask.ThreadPoolType type)
      Returns the approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.
      protected static int getOneoffTaskThreadPoolSize() 
      protected static int getPoolSize(ParaTask.ThreadPoolType threadPoolType) 
      protected static void initialize(Taskpool taskpool) 
      protected static void removeThreadFromPool(boolean isMultiTaskWorker, int threadID) 
      protected static void setPoolSize(ParaTask.ThreadPoolType threadPoolType, int poolSize)
      This method sets the size of the Thread Pool and depending on the type of the Thread Pool it takes further required actions as a result of the change.

      • setPoolSize

        protected static void setPoolSize(ParaTask.ThreadPoolType threadPoolType,
                                  int poolSize)
        This method sets the size of the Thread Pool and depending on the type of the Thread Pool it takes further required actions as a result of the change. The further actions take place in #adjustThreadPoolCapacity(ThreadPoolType, int).
        Since:
        15/9/2014
